title: Blended Research Method-Based Mathematics Education Design Reflecting Educational Technology Trends

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental mathematical computation skills and understanding of basic statistical concepts
context.additional_context: Learners are office/administrative professionals requiring practical mathematics education applicable to their work. Activities may include data collection and analysis using personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners explain the key characteristics of mixed research methods (integration of quantitative and qualitative approaches) and present applicable cases in mathematics education design
Learners collect mathematics learning attitude data using surveys and interviews and perform basic statistical analysis (mean, standard deviation, correlation)
Learners develop mathematics education designs reflecting educational technology trends through project-based assessment and incorporate peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
